Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit your business. Given its value and potential impact on your operations, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $9,500. This is a special opportunity tailored specifically for you, considering the substantial worth ($10,000) this product holds for you. I am confident it will exceed your expectations and contribute positively to your endeavors. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product. I look forward to the possibility of working with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
